## Urgent Notice! - to All the Students

This is the update from UGC: all the academic activities are postponed by a week till 8th December. If any students need any assistance, please contact the dean/assistant registrar/senior student councilor/student councilors.

## WELCOME TO THE FACULTY OF TECHNOLOGICAL STUDIES

The Faculty of Technological Studies will produce the graduates with the understanding of the fundamental knowledge and skill to perform the role as an efficient Technological professional with positive attitude and ethics necessary in fulfilling the responsibilities towards the clients and the society. They will have intellectual openings to engage in research and be innovative through independent learning to develop the required skills. Graduates with appropriate disciplines of technology could face the development challenges and meet the development goals of the Nation.

[Read more](https://fts.vau.ac.lk/index.php/elementor-107/)
